How do I split up a VPN connection using: you mean so diffrent users can vnc into a machine at the same time?
no, i have a vpn connection that only one can use. I want to split it so more users can connect

not sure how to do it with the app that comes installed on ubuntu but you can sudo apt-get install vnc4server and then su to each user type vncserver then put a password in for them then go to /home/username/.vnc/xstartup and remove the 2 comments they tell you to.
